description: NEW YORK – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian told the annual United Nations General Assembly in New York on Tuesday that it is necessary that the world stop Israel’s carnage in the Gaza Strip as soon as possible and bring an end to its “desperate barbarism” in Lebanon before it put the region and the entire world on fire.
title: Pezeshkian tells UN: Israel’s barbarism in Lebanon must be stopped

description: NEW YORK – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian told the annual United Nations General Assembly in New York on Tuesday that the “insane savagery of Israel in Lebanon must be stopped before it put the region and the world on fire.”
title: Pezeshkian tells UN: Israel’s insane savagery in Lebanon must be stopped

description: During a meeting with the President of the European Council Charles Michel on the sidelines of the 79th UN General Assembly, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said his country seeks common ground and shared perspectives to foster expanded cooperation with other nations.
title: ‘Israel tried to drag Iran into war by Haniyeh’s assassination’

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian has intensified alarm over the repercussions of Israel’s ongoing aggression in West Asia, warning that the decadence of peace in the region will eventually impact other parts of the world.
title: ‘Global peace hinges on end of Israeli aggression’

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi says the West must accept responsibility for the consequences if it fails to intervene and stop Israeli attacks on Lebanon.
title: Stop Israeli attacks on Lebanon or face the consequences, Araqchi warns West

description: TEHRAN – An American media outlet fabricated claims about Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian seeking to “ease tensions with Israel”, ignoring his request for accurate reporting during the same meeting.
title: U.S. media fabricates Iranian president's remarks, ignoring his call for honest coverage

description: President Masoud Pezeshkian issued a warning to the international community, urging them to act swiftly to prevent Lebanon from becoming "another Gaza" at the hands of Israel.
title: ‘World must not allow Lebanon to become another Gaza’

description: Talking to UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on the sidelines of the 79th UN General Assembly, Iran’s president voiced his country’s deep concerns over the escalating tensions in West Asia, which are boiling due to Israeli actions.
title: Iran ‘seriously concerned’ about expansion of regional tensions

description: TEHRAN- A musical adaptation of the folktale "The Emperor's New Clothes," will go on stage for children in Niavaran Cultural Center in Tehran on Wednesday.
title: Musical play “The Emperor's New Clothes” to go on stage in Tehran

description: TEHRAN-The 21st International Film and Television Festival Simfest that will be held from September 30 to October 6 in Tirgu Mureș, Romania, will host 11 films and series from Iran.
title: 11 Iranian films, series to compete in Romanian festival Simfest

description: TEHRAN-The Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art (TMoCA) will hold a commemoration ceremony on Wednesday for the late artist Sirak Melkonian who passed away last month.
title: TMoCA to commemorate late painter Sirak Melkonian

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short film “Smile at Me” written, directed, and produced by Keyvan Azad received an honorable mention from the 4th Youality International Short Film Festival that was held in France on September 20.
title: An honorable mention for Iran from France’s Youality International Short Film Festival

description: MADRID- The massive bombardment by the Israeli army in eastern and southern Lebanon on Monday resulted in about 560 deaths and at least 1,1850 injuries, overwhelming the already strained hospitals in the country. This escalation raises the risk of a total war and intensifies calls for an arms embargo against Israel.
title: Israel will fail to split anti-colonial resistance by attack on Lebanon

description: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned member states Tuesday about Lebanon “becoming another Gaza” amid escalating tensions with Israel.
title: UN chief: World cannot afford Lebanon to become another Gaza

description: TEHRAN - Wars and crises have always been among the most significant and impactful menacing phenomena in human history and are considered the starting point for many important historical changes.
title: The Zionist war against human civilization

description: TEHRAN- Western leaders have noticeably chosen to remain silent or turn a blind eye to the Israeli carnage in Lebanon that has shocked the world.
title: Deafening silence: West ignores Israel's bloodshed in Lebanon

description: Russia has warned that Israeli strikes on Lebanon have the potential to completely destabilize the Middle East (West Asia) and widen the conflict there.
title: Russia: Israeli strikes on Lebanon risk destabilizing Middle East

description: Many children remain “missing under rubble” and caught “on dangerous roads” after Israeli airstrikes in Lebanon, the UN children’s agency warned.
title: UNICEF: Many children still "missing under rubble" in Lebanon

description: TEHRAN- Iran and the Republic of Azerbaijan held consular talks in Baku on Monday to enhance collaboration between think tanks.
title: Iran, Azerbaijan hold consular talks to strengthen think tank collaborations

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian deputy foreign minister for legal and international affairs has vehemently denounced the actions of the Zionist regime against the oppressed populations in Palestine and beyond, labeling it a significant threat to both regional and global peace and security.
title: ‘Israel’s actions pose serious threat to regional stability’: Iranian diplomat

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesperson has stated that the appeasement of Zionist actions over the past year has strengthened the regime's resolve to pursue its genocidal agenda.
title: Appeasement of Israel's yearlong crimes fuels further aggression, Tehran says

description: TEHRAN- The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps is willing to assist in restoring the workplace for workers impacted by the mining tragedy in Tabas, the IRGC commander-in-chief declared in a message on Tuesday.
title: IRGC chief offers assistance for trapped miners

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian foreign minister has extended his congratulations to the government and citizens of Sri Lanka for successfully conducting presidential elections.
title: Iranian FM applauds Sri Lankans on presidential election

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Permanent Mission to the United Nations has characterized the adoption of the document known as the “Pact for Future” as non-binding and voluntary.
title: Iran responds to 'Pact for Future' document adopted by UN

description: TEHRAN- “Myself and the World,” Robert W. Hamblin’s biography of American prominent writer William Faulkner, has recently been published in Persian.
title: Robert Hamblin’s biography of William Faulkner published in Persian

description: Siasat-e-Rooz devoted its editorial to Ian's position against the Zionist regime and the United States in the current sensitive situation and wrote:
title: The greater the military power, the greater the retreat

description: TEHRAN - The rivalry between Esteghlal and Persepolis resumes on Wednesday, with two teams needing a win in Tehran derby.
title: Rivalry between Esteghlal and Persepolis resumes

description: TEHRAN - Western Asian countries including Iran have experienced a remarkable 26% increase in international tourist arrivals during the first seven months of 2024 compared to the same period in 2019.
title: Iran sees tourism surge amid 26% growth in Western Asia’s intl. arrivals

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts Minister has praised the “progress” made in the restoration and revitalization of historical buildings.
title: Tourism minister highlights progress in restoration of historical buildings

description: TEHRAN - The Seljuk Empire, one of the most significant Turco-Persian dynasties, played a crucial role in the revitalization of the Muslim world, and particularly in many Iranian cities, from 1037 to 1194.
title: Glimpses of Iranian architecture under Seljuk’s patronage

description: TEHRAN –Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Minister, Sattar Hashemi, and his Cuban counterpart, Mayra Arevich Marín, have explored ways to bolster cooperation in different fields of ICT.
title: Iran, Cuba to expand ties in AI, digital economy

description: TEHRAN –Stanford University, using Scopus data provided by Elsevier, has listed 2,503 Iranian researchers among the top 2 percent of the most-cited scientists in the world, a significant growth compared to 1,870 researchers in 2023.
title: Over 2,500 Iranians among world’s top 2% most-cited researchers

description: TEHRAN –The Performance Ranking of Scientific Papers for World Universities, also known as the National Taiwan University (NTU) Rankings, has placed 21 Iranian institutions among top 1,200 universities worldwide, compared to 18 universities in 2023.
title: Iranian Universities advance in NTU Rankings 2024

description: TEHRAN - The 7th International Agriculture, Horticulture, Greenhouses, Inputs and Agriculture Machinery Exhibition of Iran (IFarm 2024) opened at Shahr-e-Aftab Exhibition Center on Tuesday, IRIB reported.
title: Intl. agriculture exhibition running in Tehran

description: TEHRAN- The 13th International Investment Opportunities in Iran’s Mines and Mining Industries Exhibition and Conference (MINEX 2024) kicked off in Tehran on Monday, IRIB reported.
title: Tehran hosting MINEX 2024

description: TEHRAN – The newly appointed Head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Railway (known as RAI) Jabar-Ali Zakeri has said that representatives of the private sector should be recognized and present in the railway industry, the portal of the Iranian Transport Ministry reported.
title: RAI head welcomes private sector participation in railway industry

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Oil Minister Mohsen Paknejad has expressed hope that the Joint Economic Committee meeting of Iran and Saudi Arabia will be held in the near future, IRNA reported.
title: Iran-Saudi Arabia Joint Economic Committee meeting to be held soon

description: TEHRAN – Based on the latest data released by the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA), 5,416,446 cellphone handsets, valued at $1.225 billion, were imported into the country in the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20–September 21).
title: Iran imports over 5.4m cellphones in H1

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Energy Minister Abbas Aliabadi and his Tajik counterpart Daler Juma have reviewed ways of expanding cooperation between the two countries in various areas, especially in the electricity sector, IRNA reported.
title: Iran, Tajikistan to expand electricity cooperation
Cloud Cities. Forum on the future of BRICS cities in Russia

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Saipa lost to Vietnam’s LPBank Ninh Binh 3-1 (25-16, 25-16, 17-25, 25-19) in Pool B of the 2024 Asian Women’s Club Volleyball Championship at the Chartchai Hall on Tuesday.
title: Saipa suffer third loss at 2024 Asian Women’s Club Volleyball Championship

description: TEHRAN - Bijan Heydari has been chosen to officiate Tehran derby between Esteghlal and Persepolis football teams in Matchweek 6 of 2024/25 Iran’s Persian Gulf Professional League (PGPL).
title: Match officials confirmed for Tehran derby

description: Hezbollah early on Tuesday morning said it had launched several attacks on Israeli military targets, including an explosives factory 60 km (37 miles) into Israel, with the "Fadi" series of rockets.
title: Hezbollah fires 'Fadi 2' rockets overnight at Israeli explosives factory

description: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi expressed support for Lebanon and condemned what he termed "indiscriminate attacks against civilians", Beijing's foreign ministry said on Tuesday.
title: China FM backs Lebanon and slams 'indiscriminate attacks' on civilians
Iran calls Israel’s airstrikes in Lebanon ‘insane’

description: TEHRAN- Seyyed Ammar Hakim, the leader of Iraq's National Wisdom Movement, referenced Ayatollah Sistani's statement calling for an end to the Israeli army's aggression in Lebanon.
title: Iraq's National Wisdom Movement ready to assist Lebanon
